decks.notes: This deck focuses on controlling the game by utilizing counterspells, card draw, and board wipes to disrupt the opponent's strategy. It aims to maintain card advantage through Narset, Parter of Veils and Memory Deluge, while locking down the board with Supreme Verdict and Temporary Lockdown. Field of Ruin and Fountainport provide additional disruption by targeting the opponent's lands. The deck also includes a few win conditions such as The Wandering Emperor and March of Otherworldly Light, allowing it to close out the game once it has stabilized and gained control.

The main concept of this deck is to assemble the combo of Lotus Field and various untapping effects to generate a large amount of mana quickly. The deck utilizes cards like Hidden Strings, Vizier of Tumbling Sands, and Pore Over the Pages to untap Lotus Field multiple times in a turn. This enables the player to cast powerful spells like Dig Through Time, Aetherflux Reservoir, and Fae of Wishes to win the game or control the board. The deck also includes card draw and selection, mana fixing, and versatile removal options to support the combo strategy.
